description:
Just when it seemed like Nei the Thunder Empress`s almighty sword techniques would put an end to Gara, Dark Schneider appears and devastates the Dark Rebel Armies with his new spell, Helloween, forcing Nei to retreat. For Yoko, the arrival of Nei, Dark Schneider`s daughter and lover, is too much to handle, as is the secret that Princess Sheila holds.
Source: Official Website
